name: One Ping Only
description:
One Ping Only is an student built action adventure game putting the player in control of a submarine. Set in a long lost city on Enceladus in the far future of humanity, the goal is to explore and uncover the total destruction of the submerged utopia. Caution is advised, as some things might be better left to time.

This Game is a result of Global Game Jam 2018 and was built over the course of 2 months by a core team of 3. This is not a full game by any means and is only meant to display some of the skills and capabilities of it's creators.
